net.threebit.jvr
Class GCException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          net.threebit.jvr.JVRException
              net.threebit.jvr.DialogicException
                  net.threebit.jvr.GCException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GCException
extends DialogicException

GCException is the exception class that is thrown due to an error result from a Global Call function. A special class is given for global call errors because a GC_INFO object is provided for additional information.

See Also:

Parameters:
message - Additional message from the JVR native library about the error.
file - C/C++ file where the exception originated.
line - Line number where the exception originated.
gcInfo - GlobalCall Information about the error.
